title: Mataren el verd
subtitle: Design and layout of a novel
excerpt: Design and layout of a novel by the valencian author Carme Miquel.

description.text: Mataren el verd is a 272 pages fictionalized chronicle, by the valencian writter Carme Miquel, about the events that occured on the area of La Punta, an orchard space next to the city of Valencia, between the years 1987 and 2003, year of its complete destruction.

Since the subject of this story can be quite controversial, to have complete freedom to treat this subject as the author felt it deserved this book is a self publication financed with crowdfunding, with a production run of 1,000 copies in its first edition.
